message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $200 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $180. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $160 for the product.
I understand that $160 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $170. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $165 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll meet you at $167.50. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $167.50, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'd be willing to pay $165 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll meet you at $166. I think this is as low as I can go. Would you be willing to consider that?
